MTM.Summary: Facing challenges in college coursework, particularly in computer science.
MTM.Patterns: struggling with Java, overwhelmed by calculus, high homework load
MTM.Goals: improve programming skills, manage academic workload
MTM.Transition: Transitioning from high school to college demands.

LTM.Implications: Embarking on a new phase of educational and personal growth.
LTM.Lessons: time management, independent learning, seeking help when needed

MTM.Summary: Navigating social life changes with the transition to college.
MTM.Patterns: making new friends, feeling disconnected from high school friends
MTM.Goals: strengthen new friendships, maintain old connections
MTM.Transition: Adjusting to a new social environment.

LTM.Milestone: Transitioned from high school to college social life.
LTM.Implications: Learning to build new relationships and manage existing ones.
LTM.Lessons: adaptability, open-mindedness, importance of social networks

MTM.Summary: Experiencing the stress of college life and adjusting to new living conditions.
MTM.Patterns: stress from early mornings, existential crises, roommate issues
MTM.Goals: develop coping mechanisms, improve sleep hygiene

MTM.Summary: Feeling the financial strain of college life in NYC.
MTM.Patterns: high cost of living, feeling broke
MTM.Goals: budget better, find ways to earn money

LTM.Milestone: First experience managing personal finances in a high-cost city.
LTM.Lessons: frugal living, budgeting, seeking financial aid

MTM.Summary: Questioning the purpose of education and personal happiness.
MTM.Patterns: pondering purpose of classes, questioning societal norms
MTM.Goals: find personal meaning, develop philosophical outlook

MTM.Summary: Struggling with computer science assignments, particularly coding in Java.
MTM.Goals: improve coding skills, seek coding help
